label: Improper invoices will be returned within seven days of receipt.
quote: Improper invoices will be returned to the contractor within seven (7) days of receipt.

label: Pricing & Payment
quote: Under this contract, the following documents are required to be submitted as an attachment to the IPP invoice: - Detailed hours, labor categories and deliverables
short_label: Submit detailed hours, labor categories, deliverables with IPP invoice

label: Pricing & Payment
quote: Once registered, the Contractor is required to log in to the IPP Application at https://www.ipp.for.fiscal.treasury.gov/ and submit their invoices.
short_label: Contractor must register and submit invoices through IPP

label: Pricing & Payment
quote: If the Contractor is unable to comply with the requirement to use IPP for submitting invoices for payment, the Contractor must submit a waiver request in writing to the Contracting Officer.
short_label: If unable to use IPP, submit written waiver request to CO

label: Improper invoices will be returned within seven days of receipt.
quote: Improper invoices will be returned to the contractor within seven (7) days of receipt.
